response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and elevate your market position. Given its immense value and potential impact on your endeavors, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. This offer is designed to provide you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire a game-changing asset at a highly competitive rate. I look forward to discussing the details further and exploring how this product can contribute to your success.", "product_price": 750000}
